comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
Wonderful image.  Does anyone know of a website which identifies the insignia on these 18 footer sails?  There are so many unidentified old photos of these great boats here and at the Powerhouse Museum.
[hint @ ANMM to start one !]

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Hi Beachcomber, I don't know of a website but there is a wonderful book called 'Galloping Ghosts : Australasian 18 - footers 1890 - 1965' that has an index of vessels & their details including emblems. Many of the insignia were used by multiple boats so it can often be hard to distinguish individual vessels. Our curators have sifted through some of the WJ Hall images & identified where they can. Any input from the public of course is fabulous and perhaps an online index would be possible someday - it would certainly be useful!
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
